page.title: 18A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY
page.content:
At 7.30 a.m. my Mum wakes me up,and I have my breakfast of cornflakes,toast and coffee. I then get washed and dressed and sometimes I make my bed before I leave for school at 8.45. I live 5 mins walk away from the school. When I get to school I look for my friends and we talk until the bell goes at 9.00. We have 5 ,l hr periods in a day a l5 min morning break and 75 min lunch break. I go home for lunch except on a Tuesday when I go to the lst year history club, which is great. At 3.55 we go home and I go out to play till 5.30, then I have tea and have to do my homework, then I watch TV till I go to bed about ll.30 p.m.
P.S. I am l3 years old.
